name: Pirates (Classic Anto)
description:
This is a 2D game about pirate in a very early stage.

I'm developing it in my spare time and I'm documenting the entire process on YouTube (Italian only, sorry), Twitter and Trello. 

On this page I will periodically upload the current version of the game and I would really appreciate if you could test it and leave a comment to let me know what you think.
